---
category: news
title: "Gardaí will be able to use real-time facial recognition under planned legislation"
excerpt: "Facial recognition technology set to be used by An Garda Síochána will be able to identify and track people in real time using CCTV cameras. Minister for Justice Helen McEntee announced last week that her department is drawing up legislation to allow gardaí to use the technology to analyse CCTV footage for suspects in serious crimes or missing people."
